scripts.build: npx --package typescript tsc && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const src='src/styles'; const dest='dist/styles'; if(fs.existsSync(src)){fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(file=>{fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,file),path.join(dest,file));}); console.log('Assets copied successfully');} else {console.log('No styles folder found');}"
